articles.title: The Designer Behind the Nike Benassi Slide Is Changing Slip-On Footwear
articles.author: Matt Welty
articles.summary: Andreas Harlow is the SVP of product design at Kizik, a brand that specializes in hands-free, slip-on footwear. Harlow started his career in New Zealand in the '90s and came to Portland to work at Nike in 2002. He was there for the early days of Nike Sportswear, designed the Nike Benassi slide, worked on Nike Considered, Nike Presto, and even helped on the Nike Air Yeezy 2. In 2020 he worked his way up to VP of footwear design at Jordan Brand, working directly with Michael Jordan himself.
